18768326.Line7.136591: I was helping these people escape Caldeum when we were attacked by monsters. Now we're split up, and the damn things just keep coming.

3FF2D964.Line5.136591: I might ask you the same, this is no place for sight-seeing.

90290531.VoiceDir5.136591: Cagey, suspicious. Recognizes player as someone wanted for crimes by the Knights Penitent, waiting to see how this plays out.  Edgar is a foremer crusading Knight from up north and speaks in a somewhat formal manner, unusual for a desert traveler.

A7619319.Line19.136591: I could certainly use an extra sword, just until we get further down the road. Cover us while we move ahead and find our lost sheep.
